document.full_text: move over beatlemania. "biebermania" hit the home town of the famous fab four when a noisy crowd of fans descended on central liverpool to catch a glimpse of teenaged singing sensation justin bieber.
document.title: "biebermania" hits liverpool, home of the beatles
lines_and_colors: move over beatlemania. "biebermania" hit the home town of the famous fab four when a noisy crowd of fans descended on central liverpool to catch a glimpse of teenaged singing sensation justin bieber.
